meanings.sent1: The horse looked tired after the long, ridden journey.
meanings.sent2: The bike was ridden by the children in the park.
meanings.sent3: The worn-out saddle was a clear sign that it had been ridden many times.
meanings.sent4: Her face showed the signs of a life well ridden with experiences.
meanings.sent5: The old car, with its chipped paint, seemed to have been ridden through many adventures.

meanings.sent1: The backpack was heavy and ridden with books.
meanings.sent2: Her heart was ridden with guilt after the mistake.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was surprisingly ridden with delicious treats.
meanings.sent4: His mind was ridden with worries about the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent5: The garden was ridden with colorful flowers, creating a beautiful sight.
